traceability.evidence: No implementation found for maintenance tools: no CLI commands or scripts (e.g., src/maintenance or a dedicated entry in package.json), no source files or modules implementing REQ-MAINT-DETECT, REQ-MAINT-UPDATE, REQ-MAINT-BATCH, REQ-MAINT-VERIFY, REQ-MAINT-REPORT, or REQ-MAINT-SAFE. No tests reference docs/stories/009.0-DEV-MAINTENANCE-TOOLS.story.md, and no scripts added for batch update or detection of stale annotations.
traceability.notes: The story 009.0-DEV-MAINTENANCE-TOOLS is clearly defined in docs but there is no corresponding implementation or tests in src, lib, or tests. All acceptance criteria and requirements for maintenance tools are unmet.
